content.question: Which of the following best describes pluralist systems?

choices.label: They support economic policies that are developed and run by the state.
They allow the state to maintain control over citizen input and participation.
They promote competition among autonomous groups not linked to the state.
They use single peak associations to represent the business sector.

content.answer: They promote competition among autonomous groups not linked to the state.
